course_name: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)
summary: The course 'Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA)' is designed to provide participants with the most up-to-date certification in the field of information security and cyber. It includes a comprehensive overview of Check Point technology, installation of firewalls in standalone and distributed environments, product design and architecture, simultaneous administration in R80, security policy management, URL filtering, application control, SSL tunneling and bridging, content awareness configuration, traffic monitoring, system health and logs, legacy SmartConsole applications, network address translations, user access management with local and AD authentication, identity awareness, basic VPN concepts, and site-to-site VPN configuration. The course is hybrid, offering both on-campus sessions at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and online via Zoom. It features a fully virtual lab environment used for practice by Check Point clients in Israel and abroad. The course spans 6 sessions (30 academic hours) and includes flexible scheduling options.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Check Point Certified Security Administrator R81 (CCSA).

COURSE OVERVIEW: This course is designed to provide participants with the most up-to-date certification in the field of information security and cyber. It includes the latest version of the product in a fully virtual environment. The lab environment used in the course is utilized for training Check Point's clients both in Israel and abroad.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 22.11.2024.
- Duration: 6 sessions, 30 academic hours.
- Schedule: Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30.
- Special Sessions: On 22.11.2024, a session will be held on Friday from 09:00 to 13:00. On 26.11.2024, a session will be held on Tuesday from 17:30 to 21:30.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning: Classes will be held both on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on the participant's preference.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Check Point Technology Overview.
- Introduction to the Lab.
- Installing Firewalls in Standalone and Distributed Environments.
- Product Design and Architecture.
- Simultaneous Administration in R80.
- Security Policy Management.
- Working with Inline and Ordered Layers.
- Understanding URL Filtering and Application Control.
- Implementing SSL Tunneling and SSL Bridging.
- Configuring Content Awareness.
- Monitoring Traffic, Connections, System Health, and Logs.
- Working with Legacy SmartConsole Applications.
- Network Address Translations.
- Managing User Access with Local Authentication.
- Managing AD Authentication with Identity Awareness.
- Basic Concepts of VPN.
- Configuring Site-to-Site VPN.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an interview and register, contact: 052-5886002.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University. The school specializes in dedicated programs for the field of cyber and high-tech.

CERTIFICATIONS: Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA).
